properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 4 at 2:48AM PST until February 4 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, east winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts
up to 45 mph. For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub- freezing
temperatures as low as 27 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch,
sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible.

* WHERE...Ventura County Coast.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. Damage to outdoor plumbing possible. Expect severe
damage to crops or sensitive vegetation, and harm to
unprotected pets or livestock.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The wind, in combination with cold
temperatures in the upper 20s, will result in wind chill
readings between 12 to 20 degrees.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
